snippet: Exactly a month after Greece closed the state broadcaster ERT in a cost-cutting move, a bare-bones version of the service is back on the air.
abstract: Bare-bones version of Greece's state television network ERT returns one month after Prime Min Antonis Samaras closed it to cut costs; stripped-down service is meant to serve as transition to new government television network.
lead_paragraph: Exactly a month after Greece closed the state broadcaster ERT in a cost-cutting move, a bare-bones version of the service is back on the air.

headline.main: Greece Resumes Official State TV Programming
headline.print_headline: Greece: State TV Returns to Air
